bibl.title: Ptolemaic Street Directions in Basilea (Alexandria).
bibl.note: Summarizes recently acquired informations (including unpublished data) on the topographical situation of the Royal quarter. It seems that strict Hippodameian rules were not exercised in this area, as well as in several other parts of Ptolemaic Alexandria.

bibl.title: Alessandria e il mondo ellenistico-romano. I Centenario del Museo Greco-Romano. Alessandria, 23-27 Novembre 1992. Atti del II Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano

bibl.seg: RODZIEWICZ Mieczyslaw, Ptolemaic Street Directions in Basilea (Alexandria).

Alessandria e il mondo ellenistico-romano. I Centenario del Museo Greco-Romano. Alessandria, 23-27 Novembre 1992. Atti del II Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano (Roma, 1995) pp. 227-235, 5 plans.

Summarizes recently acquired informations (including unpublished data) on the topographical situation of the Royal quarter. It seems that strict Hippodameian rules were not exercised in this area, as well as in several other parts of Ptolemaic Alexandria.
